articles.description: They were among the guests at Beyoncé and Jay-Z’s annual Chateau Marmont bash.
articles.content:
Kendall Jenner and Bad Bunny made their couple's debut last night at an Oscars after-party, it seems.
The pair confirmed their budding romance last week (to many Bad Bunny fans' dismay) when they we… [+1948 chars]

articles.title: Oscars after-party looks that were better than red-carpet outfits - Insider
articles.description: Celebrities walked the 2023 Academy Awards red carpet in stunning outfits, but some stars wore better looks at the Vanity Fair Oscar party.

articles.title: Kelly Ripa shows off her very toned and tanned backside in a racy black gown - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 52-year-old talk show host from New Jersey wore a stunning black gown that highlighted her very toned and tanned backside. She was with husband Mark.
articles.content:
